thread.title: Casey Batchelor flaunts eye-popping assets in plunging dress as she reveals she's got a new boyfriend
thread.title_full: Casey Batchelor flaunts eye-popping assets in plunging dress as she reveals she's got a new boyfriend

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Casey Batchelor flaunts eye-popping assets in plunging dress as she reveals she's got a new boyfriend
text:
Smoking hot: Casey Batchelor (Photo: Barcroft Media) Share Get   Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Casey Batchelor was looking smoking hot when she stepped out in London on Monday night. 
Casey, 32, made sure she was turning heads when she left trendy restaurant Nobu in the capital in this sizzling look. 
The reality star had her curves on full display in the eye-catching blue halter neck dress, which featured a diamond band just below the cleavage. 
Earlier in the night, the former Celebrity Big Brother beauty was also spotted leaving the Pia Michi collection launch party with Liz McClarnon. 
Looking stunning in the silk gown, it's not hard to see why she's been snapped up by a new man. Casey Batchelor (Photo: Barcroft Media) Casey Batchelor (Photo: Barcroft Media) Casey Batchelor (Photo: Barcroft Media) 
The reality star's new boyfriend, who she's been dating for six months, owns a printing and stationary firm. 
She told The Sun that she'll be spending Valentine's Day with him, adding: “There is someone new. I haven’t spoken to anybody about him yet.” Read More Casey Batchelor dismisses ‘fake boob’ rumours and reveals she actually had them reduced 
Meanwhile, Casey's eye-popping display comes weeks after she revealed she had a boob reduction as she hit back at claims she had her breasts enlarged. 
Last month the star was forced to respond to people criticising her enviable curves and famous cleavage, with some online critics suggesting her 32F chest size has been enhanced. 
She revealed she actually had surgery to reduce the size of her bust, after her growth meant she had DDs by the time she was 12. 
After hitting a 32GG, she had them reduced to a more practical 32E - and she explained to The Sun Online that she has always faced sceptics. 
"I've had people all my life give comments under their breath saying that my boobs are fake. 'I'm a silly girl getting them enlarged to that size'," she said. Like us on Facebook
